entries.help_button_launch:
Launch into Space

Use this button to launch into space using this starship.
entries.help_button_manage:
Manage Ship Components

Use this button to manage ship components for this starship.
entries.help_stats:
Starship Information

This shows information about the general condition of this starship.
entries.condition_engine_demolished: The engine in this ship is demolished, it cannot launch.
entries.condition_engine_disabled: The engine in this ship is disabled, it cannot launch.
entries.condition_engine_uninstalled: There is no engine in this ship, it cannot launch.
entries.condition_reactor_demolished: The reactor in this ship is demolished, it cannot launch.
entries.condition_reactor_disabled: The reactor in this ship is disabled, it cannot launch.
entries.condition_reactor_uninstalled: There is no reactor in this ship, it cannot launch.
entries.help_button_travel:
Travel to another Location

Use this button to use your starship to travel to another ground location.
